title: Vaughn Hamilton
text: I am a research associate in the Safety and Society lab of Dr Elissa Redmiles. My research work is mostly concentrated in Human-Computer Interaction, and takes in qualitative interview studies, ethics work and technical analysis.

title: Vaughn Hamilton
text: I am a research associate in the Safety and Society lab of Dr Elissa Redmiles. My research work is mostly concentrated in Human-Computer Interaction, and takes in qualitative interview studies, ethics work and technical analysis.

title: Vaughn Hamilton

Education

title: Vaughn Hamilton
text:
Publications

2025

“As Someone Who is Disabled, I am so thankful for Sex Work”: Alternative Approaches to Access Among Disabled Sex-Workers. Rodolitz, J., Hamilton, V., Tabassum, M., Lerner, A., & Hofmann, M.
Proceedings of the 27th International ACM SIGACCESS Conference on Computers and Accessibility, 2025.




2024

” I feel physically safe but not politically safe”: Understanding the Digital Threats and Safety Practices of OnlyFans Creators. A Soneji, V Hamilton, A Doupé, A McDonald, EM Redmiles.
33rd USENIX Security Symposium, 2024.

” Did They {F* ing} Consent to That?“: Safer Digital Intimacy via Proactive Protection Against Image-Based Sexual Abuse. L Qin, V Hamilton, S Wang, Y Aydinalp, M Scarlett, EM Redmiles.
33rd USENIX Security Symposium, 2024.




2023

“Nudes? Shouldn’t I charge for these?”: Motivations of New Sexual Content Creators on OnlyFans. V Hamilton, A Soneji, A Mcdonald, EM Redmiles.
Proceedings of the 2023 CHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems , 2023.

Safer digital intimacy for sex workers and beyond: A technical research agenda. V Hamilton, G Kaptchuk, A McDonald, EM Redmiles.
IEEE Security & Privacy 22, 2023.

Toward safer intimate futures: Recommendations for tech platforms to reduce image based sexual abuses. L Qin, V Hamilton, Y Aydinalp, M Scarlett, S Wang, EM Redmiles.
European Sex Worker Rights Alliance, Amsterdam, The Netherlands, 2023.

2022

Proceedings of the ACM on Human-Computer Interaction 6 (CSCW2), 2022.

Risk, resilience and reward: Impacts of shifting to digital sex work. V Hamilton, H Barakat, EM Redmiles.
Proceedings of the ACM on Human-Computer Interaction 6 (CSCW2), 2022.

Ethical Practices for Security Research with At-Risk Populations R Bhalerao, V Hamilton, A McDonald, EM Redmiles, A Strohmayer.
